entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers and periods of drizzle ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
